notice:
Hi! I'm Kyrie, a teen girl developer! Thanks for supporting me. Love you all!  
Feel free to text me for issues or contact X0 Team KaiOS on ChatWave.

VCall is working now for everyone!  
A new random video call feature, like Omegle, coming soon!  
Thanks for using our app. Visit [x0.rf.gd](https://x0.rf.gd) for feedback.  
Press call button in DPad app to exit. Stay tuned for updates! ✅  
Download the X0 Support App for feedback & support. Thanks!
